metadata.name: Water World
metadata.description:
**First, unique NFT, minted by Jacek Yerka, famous Polish painter.**  
The NFT is based on the real acrylic painting "Water world" in Polish "Wodny Å›wiat", created in 2022. Some subtle animation and calming water falling sound were added. This NFT has also additional functionality allowing the owner to choose one giclee from available stock for free at [https://nova.agraart.pl](https://nova.agraart.pl).  
This option is limited to one-time only and valid for one year since the date of minting.  
Jacek Yerka is a world-wide renown artist, creating surreal and magical realism paintings, drawings and giclees. More information and works can be found at his webpage -  [https://www.yerkaland.com](https://www.yerkaland.com), facebook ([Yerkaland](https://www.facebook.com/Yerkaland)) and instagram ([jacekyerka_art](https://www.instagram.com/jacekyerka_art)). More information about the token at [https://www.agraart.pl/nft-yerka-waterworld/](https://www.agraart.pl/nft-yerka-waterworld/).
